property.name: query
property.value: "SELECT {actions:PK} action, {actions:activated} activated,{actions:comment} actioncomment, {workflows:PK} workflow,{actions:status} status FROM {WORKFLOWACTION as actions}, {Workflow as workflows},{workflowActionType as actionType},{WorkflowActionStatus as actionStatus} WHERE {actions:workflow}={workflows:pk} AND {actions:actiontype}={actionType:pk} AND {actions:status}={actionStatus:pk} AND {actionType:code}='start' AND {actionStatus:code}='in_progress' AND ({actions:principalAssigned}=?session.user OR {actions:principalAssigned} IN (?session.user.allgroups)) order by workflow, action"
